description: Retrieves the details and current status of a specific email archive search job.

parameters.name: SearchId
parameters.description: The identifier of the search job to get details for.

nested_items.name: ArchiveId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the archive the email search was performed in.

nested_items.name: Include
nested_items.description: The filter conditions for emails to include.

nested_items.name: BooleanExpression
nested_items.description: A boolean expression to evaluate against email attributes.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The name of the email attribute to evaluate.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The boolean operator to use for evaluation.

nested_items.name: StringExpression
nested_items.description: A string expression to evaluate against email attributes.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The name of the email attribute to evaluate.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The operator to use when evaluating the string values.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The list of string values to evaluate the email attribute against.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Unless
nested_items.description: The filter conditions for emails to exclude.

nested_items.name: BooleanExpression
nested_items.description: A boolean expression to evaluate against email attributes.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The name of the email attribute to evaluate.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The boolean operator to use for evaluation.

nested_items.name: StringExpression
nested_items.description: A string expression to evaluate against email attributes.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The name of the email attribute to evaluate.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The operator to use when evaluating the string values.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The list of string values to evaluate the email attribute against.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FromTimestamp
nested_items.description: The start timestamp of the range the searched emails cover.

nested_items.name: MaxResults
nested_items.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

nested_items.name: CompletionTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the search completed (if finished).

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message if the search failed.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the search job.

nested_items.name: SubmissionTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the search was submitted.

nested_items.name: ToTimestamp
nested_items.description: The end timestamp of the range the searched emails cover.
